actions.name: Scroll Bash
entries: {@atk ms} +4 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) thunder damage.

actions.name: Reduce to Memory {@recharge}
entries: Thundering golden energy erupts around a creature the apprentice can see within 90 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 33 (6d10 damage) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has disadvantage on the saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
